t: For the choir director: on stringed instruments. Of David.
God,*pn hear my cry; pay*ln attention to my prayer.
I*ln call to you from the ends of the earth when*ln my heart is without strength. Lead*ln me to a rock that is high above me,
for*ln you have been a refuge for me, a*ln strong tower in the face of the enemy.
I*ln will dwell in your tent forever and*ln take refuge under the shelter of your wings. Selah*ig
God,*pn you have heard my vows; you*ln have given a heritage to*ln those who fear your name.
Add*ln days to the kingâ€™s life; may*ln his years span many generations.
May*ln he sit enthroned before God forever. Appoint*ln faithful love and truth to guard him.
Then*ln I will continually sing of your name, fulfilling*ln my vows day by day.
